The tunnel itself is so large that it's difficult to discern its shape, and it seems to go on for miles. As you step forward, you can't help but feel that something is watching you.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Underdark
Room.Description: The massive tunnel stretches before you, dark and foreboding. Its walls are slick with some kind of slime, and the air is heavy with the sickly-sweet smell of rot. The ground beneath your feet is soft and spongy, and you can feel the squish of something unpleasant beneath your boots. The tunnel itself is so large that it's difficult to discern its shape, and it seems to go on for miles. As you step forward, you can't help but feel that something is watching you.

Room.Name: A Large Cave Mouth Leading into Darkness
Room.Description: You stand before a large cave mouth that seems to lead into the depths of the earth. The opening is dark, and you can barely make out what lies beyond. Above you, the hillside is riddled with smaller cave openings, and the air is filled with the musty scent of damp earth and minerals. The ground beneath your feet is rocky and uneven, with sharp outcroppings of stone jutting out here and there. The cave mouth is large enough to swallow you whole, and you can feel a cool breeze blowing out from within.

Room.Name: A Series of Caves Along the Hillside
Room.Description: Above you, the hillside is riddled with smaller cave openings, and the air is filled with the musty scent of damp earth and minerals. The ground beneath your feet is rocky and uneven, with sharp outcroppings of stone jutting out here and there.

Room.Name: A Trail Beneath the Hills
Room.Description: The rocky trail snakes away from the northward thoroughfare and cuts through the rough terrain of the hills, winding in and out of small valleys and dipping alongside babbling brooks. The trail is narrow and rocky, hemmed in by dense thickets of trees and shrubs that threaten to overtake the path at any moment. Here and there, jagged boulders jut out from the hills, casting deep shadows over the path and making it treacherous to navigate.

Room.Name: A Trail Beneath the Hills
Room.Description: The rocky trail snakes away from the northward thoroughfare and cuts through the rough terrain of the hills, winding in and out of small valleys and dipping alongside babbling brooks. The trail is narrow and rocky, hemmed in by dense thickets of trees and shrubs that threaten to overtake the path at any moment. Here and there, jagged boulders jut out from the hills, casting deep shadows over the path and making it treacherous to navigate.

Room.Name: A Trail Beneath the Hills
Room.Description: The rocky trail snakes away from the northward thoroughfare and cuts through the rough terrain of the hills, winding in and out of small valleys and dipping alongside babbling brooks. The trail is narrow and rocky, hemmed in by dense thickets of trees and shrubs that threaten to overtake the path at any moment. Here and there, jagged boulders jut out from the hills, casting deep shadows over the path and making it treacherous to navigate.

NPC.name: enforcer eye
NPC.description: These eyes are all over the Under dark, they make sure all the rules are obeyed. They are just that, huge eyes that float above the ground. The eye has a dark brown shell, with a huge pupil that never seems to blink. The pupil is a very dark green and takes in every action you do.
NPC.longDescription: A large eye watches all your moves

NPC.name: floating eye
NPC.description: The eye flies at about your head level watching everything that happens. These eyes have been known to steal from people and to play "jokes" on others. The eye's pupil is a very dark grey and you can't tell where it is focused.
NPC.longDescription: A floating eye drifts in and out of the shadows

NPC.name: prisoner
NPC.description: You look at this prisoner disgusted, how could anyone be put in a jail in this city? This fellow must have committed the ultimate in crimes. He stares at you and does nothing else. It looks as if he has lost the will to live, you wonder what the enforcers did to him.
NPC.longDescription: A prisoner stares at you from the back of the cell

NPC.name: great enforcer eye
NPC.description: This eye is the right hand of the Beholder who is in charge of the enforcers. The shell of this eye is brown and crusty, almost like scales. The pupil of this eye is a very deep red. Looking at it makes you slightly dizzy.
NPC.longDescription: A huge eye floats in the air here, ready to punish all

NPC.name: beholder eye
NPC.description: A globular body greets your curious gaze. This beholder is the head of the enforcers of the Underdark. The enforcers keep a tenuous peace, keeping prolonged fights from occurring but allowing stealing and assassinations. This body is a sphere with ten eyestalks ontop. A huge eleventh eye resides in the central area. A large mouth with razor sharp teeth lies below this huge eye. The body is protected by a hard chitinous covering.
NPC.longDescription: A huge beholder watches over the other enforcers

NPC.name: beholder
NPC.description: A huge spherical body floats in the air here. Ontop of the sphere reside 10 moving eyestalks. A huge eye is in the centre of the sphere. This huge eye seems to disrupt your casting abilities. This beholder lives in this city and masterminds many evil operations.
NPC.longDescription: A beholder of incredible size floats here scheming against the world
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary DetectIllusion

NPC.name: svirfneblin deep gnome
NPC.description: Before you stands a svirfneblin, a deep gnome. Much like a regular gnome the only real difference is the fact that this gnome's skin is a brownish grey and he is going slightly bald.
NPC.longDescription: A brownish grey gnome watches you warily

NPC.name: drow trader
NPC.description: A black-skinned and pale-haired elf stands before you heading somewhere with a purpose to sell his goods. Although he looks skinny he looks very deadly and quick.
NPC.longDescription: A drow trader goes about his business

NPC.name: dwarf duergar
NPC.description: Before you stands an emaciated, evil-visaged dwarf. His skin is dark grey. He wears clothing that is a dark grey, he seems to blend into his surroundings.
NPC.longDescription: A dark dwarf wanders about

NPC.name: necromancer mage
NPC.description: You turn your gaze on a necromancer who seems to have power flowing through every one of her movements. Her visage is gaunt and strained, it seems as if at every moment she is concentrating on a spell of some sort.
NPC.longDescription: A necromancer dressed in flowing dark robes

NPC.name: behir
NPC.description: Before you stands a snake-like reptilian monster with a dozen legs that must allow it to move with considerable speed, you recall that you once heard stories of these creatures climbing walls. The head is more crocodilian than snake-like. The scales are ultramarine with bands of grey-brown. The belly is pale blue.
NPC.longDescription: A behir stands here waiting for orders from it's master

NPC.name: fighter
NPC.description: This fighter looks like a bounty hunter who has had some luck. Your mind goes wild imagining the many possibilities of why he is in the Under Dark, perhaps there is some creature that has had a reward placed on it's head, whatever the reason is the fighter doesn't seem that happy that you are staring at him.
NPC.longDescription: A very evil looking fighter chats with his companions

NPC.name: high priest
NPC.description: Before you stands a cleric of Xevior. He is tall and lanky, he seems to shimmer in and out of existence much like a mirage. He bears the design of Xevior on his forehead.
NPC.longDescription: A priest of Xevior stands with his fellow group members
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary DetectIllusion

NPC.name: lizard man
NPC.description: A figure of muscular build who looks vaguely human. He is covered in little scales and seems to be light green in colour. He stares at you as you look at him. Ready for any move you may make on him.
NPC.longDescription: A reptilian man stands in the shadows off to the side

NPC.name: purple worm
NPC.description: Before you lies a worm of incredible size and power. The worm is about 40 feet long and is purple in colour. The worm has huge teeth which it uses to slowly crush it's prey if they are unlucky enough not to be swallowed whole.
NPC.longDescription: A purple worm bursts from the ground before you

NPC.name: purple worm huge
NPC.description: This worm is almost 60 feet long and 13 feet in diameter. It is a very dark purple and has teeth about 4 inches long each. The mouth is so large that it looks like a small cavern. You can only see the front of the worm since it's whole mass can not possibly fit in the corridor.
NPC.longDescription: A huge purple worm erupts from the earth before you

NPC.name: underling beholder
NPC.description: Before you stands a human who takes orders from the beholder. His life goal is to serve the beholder. He is dressed in green and black. On his hands he wears a pair of gauntlets that bear the beholders symbol, an eye with ten eyestalks around it.
NPC.longDescription: An underling of the beholder carries out it's malicious plans

NPC.name: beholder legionnaire
NPC.description: You see before you a robed figure who looks vaguely human. You've heard stories that the beholder's forces weren't human now you know they aren't, you look closer to see just what type of humanoid he is. Then he looks straight at you and you see glowing red eyes. This figure is a githzerai! You wonder how that happened.
NPC.longDescription: A robed legionnaire bearing the emblem of the beholder stands alert

NPC.name: beholder attendant
NPC.description: This figure is robed and looks almost human. Then you notice his eyes, they glow green in this light. His gaze challenges you to either attack or leave him in peace. He holds himself with confidence and you realise it would no easy matter to defeat him.
NPC.longDescription: A robed attendant seems mildly annoyed with your intrusion

NPC.name: grell brain
NPC.description: The appearance of this dreadful creature is fearsome indeed: a body like a giant exposed brain approximately five feet in diameter and with a frontal beak, below which trail ten six foot long tentacles hang. The body of the grell is a drab olive colour streaked with white; the tentacles are pale olive-green. This grell is the beloved pet of the beholder.
NPC.longDescription: A large ugly floating brain with a beak wants to be fed

NPC.name: barkeep bartender
NPC.description: You are looking at the barkeep of the gemstone. This is his establishment, and you get the feeling if you do anything destructive or stupid he will make you pay.
NPC.longDescription: The barkeep stands here ready to help you if you can pay

NPC.name: patron duergar
NPC.description: This duergar stares right back at you as you check him over.He would stand about four feet tall at max you figure. Built like an ox this guy could easily pick you up. You figure he frequents the Gemstone since he just seems to fit in.
NPC.longDescription: A duergar sits here drinking ale while staring at you

NPC.name: patron drow
NPC.description: The drow doesn't seem to be looking at anything at all. His dark skin blends in with the murky lighting. The drow looks quick and deadly.
NPC.longDescription: A drow sits here quietly minding his own business

NPC.name: patron human
NPC.description: This drunk is a slob, he has no life. You can tell that he is fat and out of shape, the only thing going for him is the fact that he looks strong. He has a gut that hangs out right over his belt, and a few scars on his face
NPC.longDescription: A human is sitting here very drunk and very loud

NPC.name: adventurer caris
NPC.description: Caris looks to be a well seasoned adventurer, he has much equipment that he has taken care of. Caris is human and has dark brown hair, he is quite good looking. His eyes are green and seem to hold the key to power in them.
NPC.longDescription: Caris the experienced adventurer sits here watching you

NPC.name: adventurer antryg
NPC.description: Antryg is dressed in long robes that cover up his body. You can't tell how built he is, but you do know he looks very deadly and dangerous
NPC.longDescription: Antryg sits here sipping on his beer

NPC.name: gremlin form
NPC.description: You are looking at a small ugly creature. It is staring right at you, with beady yellow eyes. It's skin is a dark greenish colour and looks to be slimy. This little fellow has nasty little teeth and questing hands that pick up anything.
NPC.longDescription: A small dark form jeers at you from the shadows

NPC.name: creature slime
NPC.description: The slime is green and oozes slowly down the wall onto the floor. You look closely and notice with a start that it seems to be alive. The slime is slowly eating it's way through the wall and floor.
NPC.longDescription: A weird shape made of slime flows along the wall

NPC.name: huge rat
NPC.description: This is an incredibly huge rat, you have never seen anything comparable on the surface. The rat has green eyes that seem to shimmer with hatred. The rat's fur is black and brown and very dirty.
NPC.longDescription: A huge rat about five feet long stares right at you

NPC.name: jinxkin humanoid
NPC.description: Before you stands what looks like a diminutive human wearing baggy clothing and an ill-fitting leather helmet. You realise right away, this is one of the "little people" who cause trouble. You then notice this jinxkin has dirty but sharp nails.
NPC.longDescription: A small dirty humanoid form peers down at you from the rafters

NPC.name: jermlaine human form
NPC.description: You see a small ugly human form. It is wearing baggy clothing and an ill- fitting leather helmet. The jermlaine is close enough to notice that the clothing isn't actually clothing but it is folds of skin and the helmet is just the head, all leathery and smooth. The limbs of this creature are knotty and bowed, with hands and feet tipped with thick nails which are filthy.
NPC.longDescription: A short human form watches you from the shadows

NPC.name: bodak humanoid
NPC.description: Before you stands a bodak, rarely seen on this plane. The bodak you figure was summoned by a mage and quickly defeated him. The bodak has dark grey, pearly skin. It's muscular body has no hair, and the head is long with oddly distorted features. The eyes are milky-white, vertical ovals of large size.
NPC.longDescription: A grey skinned demonic humanoid sits on the throne waiting for you

NPC.name: mage
NPC.description: This mage once summoned a bodak, his greatest achievement. The mage then found out just how little his own power was. The bodak sucked his life away and left him as this husk, skin that clings to the bones. The mage stares at you, his eyes bloodshot and sunken into their sockets.
NPC.longDescription: The sucked corpse of a once powerful mage rises to attack

NPC.name: iron golem
NPC.description: This looks to be an iron statue of a human. The statue stands a good fifteen feet tall. In fact it almost looks as if it can move. You then glance at it's eyes and notice with a shock that they are watching you.
NPC.longDescription: A huge iron statue of a human stands to the side

NPC.name: stone golem
NPC.description: This is a large stone statue of a man. The statue stands ten feet tall and looks powerful enough to rip off your head without straining. The statue looks as if it is watching you.
NPC.longDescription: A large stone statue stands waiting next to the wall

NPC.name: human warlord itreres
NPC.description: This is Itreres, a guest of the bodak. He comes here hoping to forge an alliance with one of the most powerful figures in the underdark. Itreres is a bear of a man, he ripples with muscles. He has scars all over his arms and you are pretty sure all over his body.
NPC.longDescription: A huge man rests here watching you as your barge into his room

NPC.name: imp
NPC.description: This is a small imp who has become the familiar of the bodak. He is the eyes and ears of the bodak, if the bodak so desires.
NPC.longDescription: A small imp is here spying for the bodak
NPC.affectedBy: Invisible DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared Sneak Hide DetectIllusion

NPC.name: minor demon babau
NPC.description: Before you stands a demon of incredible horror. The demon has a horn-like growth that projects from the back of the skull. The demon is tall and appears much as a skeleton in form-fitting black leather. Its extremities are larger than normal, however. Its feet, hands, and head are the size of a hill giant's. The taloned fingers are deadly. This is the babau.
NPC.longDescription: A dark twisted form a demon is ready to devour you

NPC.name: servant
NPC.description: This is a servant. He is ready to serve whomever his current master is.
NPC.longDescription: A servant stands off to the side ready to serve his master

NPC.name: gibbering mouther lump
NPC.description: The so called lump is in fact a gibbering mouther. The gibbering mouther is an amoeboid-like form of life, composed of all mouths and eyes. The thing looks like a large blob that has eyes and mouths all over it, the blob is basically earthy in colour.
NPC.longDescription: A lump of earthy material lies in the corner

NPC.name: worker female
NPC.description: You behold a beautiful girl who is yours to command.. for a price. You realise if you touch the goods her "boss" will be mighty upset.
NPC.longDescription: A luscious female offers her services to you

NPC.name: maid woman
NPC.description: This woman is dressed in what you think is a maid's costume. She is very beautiful and her shape awakens your desire. She looks disappointed when she realises that you haven't paid for her services and ignores you from then on.
NPC.longDescription: A truly beautiful woman offers to serve your every desire

NPC.name: granter man
NPC.description: This man is truly amazing. He is muscular and well built. Everything about him is perfect. He looks you over and licks his lips indicating he's ready when you have paid up.
NPC.longDescription: A very handsome man stands ready to grant you anything you want

NPC.name: noble customer
NPC.description: This a noble who has a bit too much time on his hands. He has spent quite a fortune in this establishment. He is a little overweight and his belly spills over his pants.
NPC.longDescription: A slobbering man of noble birth has obviously been here before

NPC.name: man pimp
NPC.description: This the pimp of the girls and guys of this establishment. He wears expensive jewellery and has a few gold teeth. He seems nice enough here but you realise that he must be a terror to his underlings.
NPC.longDescription: A man sits behind the desk waiting for you to pay for the services

NPC.name: halfling patron
NPC.description: This halfling is just like any other, short and diminutive. The only difference being this halfling looks to be very dangerous. He seems to have the confidence that one could only find if he had been brought up on the streets of this foul city.
NPC.longDescription: A halfling sits here drinking ale watching the crowd carefully

NPC.name: half-orc patron
NPC.description: This half-orc is extremely built with many scars over it's ugly visage. The half-orc has a huge nose and it's teeth are yellow and fang like. The half-orc is guzzling down the ale looking for trouble.
NPC.longDescription: A half-orc sits here leering at all who pass

NPC.name: gnome patron
NPC.description: This deep gnome sits at the table watching for suckers to prey upon. His skin is grey and his eyes are also grey. He looks to be very dangerous.
NPC.longDescription: A deep gnome sits here watching his back

NPC.name: inn keeper
NPC.description: The inn keeper is huge and looks to be very very deadly should you not pay up for food eaten. Apart from that the inn keeper is a very kind person who listens patiently to the stories of the adventurers that pass through here.
NPC.longDescription: The inn keeper stands ready behind the bar for your order

NPC.name: duergar
NPC.description: Before you sits a duergar of impressive build. From the mutterings around you know his name is Limbeck, a hero down here. He has reputedly killed a purple worm single handed.
NPC.longDescription: A duergar adventurer sits here telling his heroic tales to those around

NPC.name: gnome
NPC.description: This deep gnome goes by the name Geg, which you overheard while walking through the inn. He is one of the heroes of this city, and for that reason many people are after his life.
NPC.longDescription: A deep gnome adventurer is resting on the bed

NPC.name: drow
NPC.description: This is Drevlin, one of the drow's most powerful warrior. He once defeated the drow weapon's master without a weapon. He is very ruthless and quick. His dark skin and pointed ears makes him look like a demon.
NPC.longDescription: A drow warrior sits here watching you carefully

NPC.name: half-orc
NPC.description: This half-orc goes by the name Jarre. He is huge and very very ugly. He is the champion of this facility, although the inn keeper doesn't allow him to fight inside the inn, Jarre has crushed many an opponents skull just outside the door.
NPC.longDescription: A half-orc of incredible size growls a challenge at you

NPC.name: serving wench
NPC.description: Tired and exhausted, this girl is not that pretty to look at. You wonder what she would be like if hadn't been worked to the bone for about three years now. Her hair you figure hasn't been washed for a few days now, although that is better than you yourself.
NPC.longDescription: A serving wench hurries from table to table fulfilling orders

NPC.name: slave dealer
NPC.description: The slave dealer is huge and looks mighty mean. He patiently waits for you to decide on which slave you wish to buy.
NPC.longDescription: The slave dealer stands ready to sell you slaves

NPC.name: slave trader
NPC.description: The slave trader deals in slaves. This trader is obviously very wealthy sporting much jewellery that he has garnished from this prosperous trading.
NPC.longDescription: A slave trader wonders if you are a perspective buyer

NPC.name: merchant slave buyer
NPC.description: The mecrchant has a cruel look in his eye, he looks like the type of master that any slave would dread.
NPC.longDescription: A merchant looks ready to buy all the slaves he sees.

NPC.name: orc slave
NPC.description: The orc slave looks none to pleased about being a slave.
NPC.longDescription: An orc slave stands here waiting for orders.

NPC.name: goblin slave
NPC.description: The goblin slave watches you with distrust and hatred.
NPC.longDescription: A goblin slave waits for his orders.

NPC.name: male human slave
NPC.description: A male human slave stands before you with his back rigid, his spirit hasn't been broken... yet.
NPC.longDescription: A male human slave waits for his orders.

NPC.name: female human slave
NPC.description: A female human slave stands before you watching you carefully.
NPC.longDescription: A female human slave waits for her orders.

NPC.name: kobold slave
NPC.description: A small kobold looks like a strong fierce fighter.
NPC.longDescription: A small kobold stands ready.

NPC.name: elf slave
NPC.description: The elven slave looks as if he would defend his master, if he had to.
NPC.longDescription: An elven slave stands ready for orders.

NPC.name: dwarf slave
NPC.description: The dwarven slave looks outright rebellious, but you realise he would fight if ordered to.
NPC.longDescription: A dwarven slave stands ready for his orders.

NPC.name: bar tender
NPC.description: Before you stands a large man who has seen everything in his life. He is a retired adventurer and can defeat any mortal who would be idiotic enough to attack him.
NPC.longDescription: A large man stands behind the counter ready to take your order

NPC.name: drow adventurer
NPC.description: This adventurer's name is well known in this establishment, he goes by the name Prax. He is an accomplished mage, and seems to breathe magic.
NPC.longDescription: A drow adventurer sits with his party watching you.

NPC.name: drow warrior
NPC.description: This drow is a very strong warrior. He has never been defeated in his entire career. He goes by the name Thespan.
NPC.longDescription: A drow warrior watches you keenly while sipping his ale

NPC.name: drow thief
NPC.description: This drow is not to be trusted, he has a well earned reputation of being able to steal anything off of anyone. Maybe you should check your gold.
NPC.longDescription: A drow thief sits at the table with his companions watching you

NPC.name: gnome mage
NPC.description: This gnome has just begun to build herself a reputation. She is has just on the threshold of becoming powerful, no easy feat in the Underdark. She is clearly very intelligent and cunning.
NPC.longDescription: A deep gnome mage sits quietly watching you with disinterest

NPC.name: gnome thief
NPC.description: This gnome is a part of this adventuring group that is just on the verge of becoming a powerful force in the Underdark, given a few more years and they will be a force to be reckoned with. Knowing this one of the city's beholder's has outfitted them and protects them.
NPC.longDescription: A deep gnome thief sits back guzzling ale and chats with his companions

NPC.name: duergar warrior
NPC.description: This warrior's name is Emba. Although this group is a strange sight in the Underdark due to their different races they work well together. You wonder if this group is an indication that the under world races may be getting closer together, which would be a very bad thing for the surface races.
NPC.longDescription: A duergar warrior drains his ale with his fellows

NPC.name: drow thief
NPC.description: This drow thief has just begun to give himself a name in the Underdark. From the conversations around you, you figure his name is Shillikif. This group has reputedly found a way into the githzerai keep from the Underdark.
NPC.longDescription: A drow thief sits with his companions and watches you

NPC.name: drow Yie'Stei
NPC.description: Yie'Stei is a drow mage of some repute, he's been able to maintain this shop even while others have tried to take it from him. He has a very profitable business going.
NPC.longDescription: Yie'Stei the watchful mage waits for you to buy something

NPC.name: drow zae'tres
NPC.description: Zae'tres is a drow merchant who has a booming trade here in the Underdark. When the town was first established he quickly realised that there would be a profitable trade in selling arms, especially drow arms to those who visit this unique city.
NPC.longDescription: Zae'tres watches you, waiting for you to buy something

NPC.name: duergar Raesarnt
NPC.description: Raesarnt is a duergar who is now making a bundle in dealing with armour and selling it at a ridiculous price. Raesarnt is a stocky little fellow who obviously has been through a lot in his life. He walks with a quiet confidence of one who has seen everything and knows nothing can best him.
NPC.longDescription: Raesarnt the duergar armourer waits patiently on you

NPC.name: satori human
NPC.description: Satori is one of the few female merchants of the Underdark. It is rumoured that she killed all her rivals by murdering them while they slept. She is a beautiful lady who always gets her way.
NPC.longDescription: Satori the jeweller waits to buy what you have to offer her

NPC.name: jiestis
NPC.description: Jiestis is a svirfneblin, a deep gnome. He sells many varieties of roots and mushrooms to those of the Underdark. It is rumoured that some of his food has healing properties. Jiestis is a small figure who is easy to overlook, yet he seems to be very very powerful, not a person to mess with.
NPC.longDescription: Jiestis watches you to see that you steal nothing and pay for all

NPC.name: svirfneblin gnome
NPC.description: This svirfneblin or deep gnome has taken sanctuary in the embassy. By the way he is acting you figure he is running from something. He is dressed is dark grey clothing and stands a good five feet tall.
NPC.longDescription: A svirfneblin looks at you with hatred and mistrust

NPC.name: svirfneblin dignitary
NPC.description: This is a svirfneblin dignitary who is using the embassy as a place of rest. He has just been rather shaken up by his visit to the drow city and has come here to find comfort in the safe walls of this building. He is dressed in different shades of grey and sports a nice looking necklace
NPC.longDescription: A svirfneblin dignitary looks up surprised by your entry

NPC.name: svirfneblin caretaker
NPC.description: This is the caretaker of the embassy. It is his duty to make sure that the building is kept clean and open all year round. He was once a powerful figure in his homeland, but he fell out of favour and was sent here. He does his duty with a fanatic pride.
NPC.longDescription: The caretaker of the embassy watches you with mistrust

NPC.name: footpad
NPC.description: This is one of the younger thieves of the guild. He has considerable experience, like all the thieves in the Underdark. Although he has plenty of experience his skills aren't refined like those of his superiors.
NPC.longDescription: A footpad slinks through the shadows

NPC.name: cutpurse
NPC.description: This thief has begun his climb to the top. He has just begun to prove himself to the guild, by working the streets he is looking for that perfect steal or kill.
NPC.longDescription: A cutpurse moves silently through the shadows

NPC.name: filcher
NPC.description: This figure is a thief of minor repute. He's been in the city for awhile now and knows who to pick on. He is lean but covered in muscles, with many scars from countless fights.
NPC.longDescription: A filcher walks silently along the street

NPC.name: rogue
NPC.description: This thief is on the threshold of becoming a high ranking member of the guild. He only has to make his name even and bigger, and thus he is willing to take greater risks.
NPC.longDescription: A rogue disappears amongst the shadows

NPC.name: sharper
NPC.description: This thief has finally made it into the guild itself. Although just a guard, he is proud to be in the guild's main building. He will defend the guild with his life.
NPC.longDescription: A sharper guards the entrance to the guild

NPC.name: magsman thief
NPC.description: This thief is dressed richly and has lots of money. He is very confident in his ability to both kill and steal. He lives in the guild where the head thief can watch him.
NPC.longDescription: A thief rests in the comfort of the guild

NPC.name: master thief
NPC.description: This thief is one of the most powerful figures of the guild. He is dressed in silk and has many items of jewellery. The thief movements are as fluid as water, he seems to flow rather than move.
NPC.longDescription: A master thief sits here watching you carefully

NPC.name: head thief
NPC.description: This is the head of the guild. He isn't that tall nor impressive in size. But he has a quiet certainty about him, all his movements are precise and calculated. The thief has a cunning that made him the head of this guild, and he makes sure non of the other thieves gets near him in power.
NPC.longDescription: The head thief stares at you daring you to challenge him

NPC.name: mage
NPC.description: This is the thieve's guild main mage. He is the only one who power anywhere near that of the head's. Meliadus is dressed in a long flowing robe and lights the room with a rob shaped like a hand holding an orb.
NPC.longDescription: The guild's mage is resting here

NPC.name: trainer
NPC.description: This is the trainer of the thieve's guild. He is the one that helps the thieves increase in ability and skill. He is also the only member of the guild who is stronger than the leader.
NPC.longDescription: The trainer of the thieve's guild stands here

NPC.name: bravo assassin
NPC.description: Before you stands a human of extreme danger, he is an assassin. He is dressed in black. He is very skilled at the art of hitting the critical spot, so watch your back.
NPC.longDescription: A bravo flits from shadow to shadow, ready to strike

NPC.name: murderer assassin
NPC.description: This is a drow assassin, he blends into the shadows on each side of the street. You can barely make out his form as he moves silently, looking for the opening.
NPC.longDescription: A drow murderer blends into the shadows watching for an opening

NPC.name: thug assassin
NPC.description: This assassin is very dangerous, he is built and strong. He flits in and out of the shadows. As an assassin he has the capability of nailing you with a critical hit, watch your back and don't hang around.
NPC.longDescription: A thug looks at you looking to kill you

NPC.name: killer assassin
NPC.description: Before you stands a killer of extreme power and might, although if you can survive the first hit, you may be able to kill him. Do not be deceived by the match up, his strike is deadly.
NPC.longDescription: A killer steps in and out of the shadows

NPC.name: assassin
NPC.description: This assassin is very dangerous. There are very few creatures out there who match up with the power of the assassin. Should you take the time to read all of this, I caution you to move right away.
NPC.longDescription: An assassin dressed in black appears from the shadows

NPC.name: expert assassin
NPC.description: This assassin has become extremely powerful and dangerous. The assassin is sheathed completely in black. Wearing a mask you can not tell what this assassin really looks like.
NPC.longDescription: An expert assassin watches you calmly, ready to strike

NPC.name: senior assassin
NPC.description: This assassin is ready to kill you if need be. His list of victims is way too long to write out. One of the most powerful assassins of the land, he can take out almost foe.
NPC.longDescription: An assassin of extreme beauty and power waits for the perfect moment

NPC.name: prime assassin
NPC.description: This is one of the most powerful assassins in the realm. His power goes beyond just fighting, he is versed in the art of death. He has practised many long hours to learn how to hit the critical spot.
NPC.longDescription: An assassin of exceptional power waits calmly to kill you

NPC.name: guildmaster assassin
NPC.description: This is the most powerful assassin in the realm, he has the ability to kill any mortal. His price is extremely high, but he has never failed.
NPC.longDescription: An assassin of awesome repute stands here debating to kill you

NPC.name: assassin trainer
NPC.description: This is a figure of extreme power. He can defeat anything that walks the land and is mortal.
NPC.longDescription: The assassin's trainer stands here ready to help you progress

NPC.name: darken beast
NPC.description: This is creature is about five feet tall with wings that spread out ten feet wide. The wings are membrane and you can see the sickly green blood pulsating through them. The beast's eyes are a dirty reddish colour and the focus right at you.
NPC.longDescription: A disfigured cross between a large bat and a weasel screams at you

NPC.name: skyzorr'n
NPC.description: A skyzorr'n is a race of insectoid beings. The skyzorr'n looks rather like a large bipedal ant. Its head is rather small but with two large compound eyes and fair-sized mandibles. No ears, as such, are present, but there are three tiny, well covered holes on either side of the head. The body is thin and stick-like. It has four arm/claw appendages, with reasonably developed pincer-hands on the two uppermost and dagger-like claws on the two lower ones.
NPC.longDescription: A skyzorr'n wanders about

NPC.name: dretch demon
NPC.description: Before you stands a creature with a round, rubbery body and thin, spindly arms and legs. It has a small head set squarely on it's shoulders. The hair is sparse and bristly, the ears are lopped and they stick out. The eyes are slanted downward and the nose appears to be squashed. The mouth is slack and slobbering with many small fangs.
NPC.longDescription: A dretch preforms the tasks Eurandus asks of it

NPC.name: platinum golem statue
NPC.description: This is a huge golem, but not like any you have seen before. This golem is made out of platinum and it looks to be very strong. You wouldn't want to end up in a battle with a foe like this if you were weak.
NPC.longDescription: A huge statue made of platinum watches you as if it were alive

NPC.name: duergar merchant
NPC.description: This is Gulthac who has a booming trade dealing with all sorts of grotesque creatures, like the ones that Eurandus creates. He is a powerful warrior and is rarely beaten in a fight.
NPC.longDescription: A powerful duergar merchant is here to buy weird creatures

NPC.name: mage eurandus
NPC.description: Before you stand a figure who is very impressive. He looks to be as strong as the stronger fighter and as quick as any thief. He has jet black hair which he holds back in braids. He is very handsome, but his eyes give away his insanity.
NPC.longDescription: Eurandus stands before you in all his might...

NPC.name: keeper
NPC.description: This man seems as if he comes from the earth, his visage seems to be carved from the very stones of the underdark. His gaze pierces through the darkness between you and him and penetrates into your mind. You can tell that this man is extremely powerful.
NPC.longDescription: The Keeper stands here watching over his wards

NPC.name: xaren
NPC.description: The xaren is a relative of the xorn. The creature before you has three legs and three appendages which serve as arms. Each of the appendages has three large claws on them. On the top of the creature, where the head should be is a huge gaping mouth. On both sides of the appendage facing you are two large eyes. The skin of this creature looks just like rock and thus it seems to fade into the background.
NPC.longDescription: A xaren blends into the surrounding rock making it very hard to see

NPC.name: cloaker cloak
NPC.description: This is a cloaker, a shadow-dwelling, unearthly creature. A cloaker resembles a large semicircular cloak or blanket with two claw-like appendages at the tips and a long, mace-like tail. Black eyespots cover its back like buttons on a cloak, and when the tail is hidden it is almost impossible to distinguish from a real cloak. In the middle of the front is a large gaping mouth and two glowing eyespots.
NPC.longDescription: A cloak rises off the floor and stares at you with two glowing eyes

NPC.name: human fighter
NPC.description: Before you sits Lord Rygar, a fighter of some repute. People have said that he once killed a wrym single handed. He is a brute of a man, with muscles rippling all over his body. He sports a long black beard and his hair is black. He looks very evil.
NPC.longDescription: A human fighter sits at a table minding his own business

NPC.name: half-orc thief
NPC.description: This is Orak, a half-orc thief. A member of the thieves guild, he operates freely. Orak has a great name, although slow at times his remarkable dexterity and intelligence has helped him become one of the leading thieves in the Underdark.
NPC.longDescription: A half-orc sits with a human discussing terms for a job

NPC.name: drow mage
NPC.description: This is Sabrakarn a drow mage. He has become a powerful force in the politics of his homeland. He is here to learn new destructive spells so he can become the most feared drow in the land
NPC.longDescription: A drow mage lies on the bed meditating

NPC.name: svirfneblin fighter
NPC.description: This is Hangharid, a svirfneblin fighter. He has vanquished many foes and all his enemies fear him. Even though he is a gnome, he has strength that rivals that of an ogre.
NPC.longDescription: A svirfneblin fighter rests on the bed

NPC.name: drow cleric
NPC.description: Sifrim is one of the few powerful drow clerics. He is dressed all in black and stares at your with glowing eyes. A dangerous fellow by far.
NPC.longDescription: A drow cleric sits cross legged on the ground

NPC.name: duergar fighter
NPC.description: This is Wismarel, a duergar fighter. Wismarel is here to find his fortune and hopes to find many powerful magical items.
NPC.longDescription: A duergar fighter polishes his sword

NPC.name: human mage
NPC.description: This is Methuen, a mage. Methuen has come to the Underdark in search of magical items to enhance his considerable magical prowess.
NPC.longDescription: A human mage opens his eyes as you barge into his room

NPC.name: human fighter
NPC.description: This is Cedrena, a fighter. She seeks items of power and might to enhance her fighting abilities. She is also seeking the fabled purple worms of the Underdark.
NPC.longDescription: A human fighter lies on her bed deep in thought

NPC.name: inn keep
NPC.description: This is the inn keep of the Traveller's Den. He makes sure everyone gets what they want and provides soft beds for those who wish to stay here.
NPC.longDescription: The inn keep stands ready to take your order

NPC.name: clan member
NPC.description: Before you stands a human who is dressed in black and red. He has dedicated his life to serving the demons of the abyss. His eyes glow with fanatical desire to be one with the demons.
NPC.longDescription: A member of the demon clan watches you warily

NPC.name: demon clan mage
NPC.description: This is one of the clan mages, he is dressed in flowing red and black robes. He is also wearing red and black bracers.
NPC.longDescription: A clan mage walks about lost in thought

NPC.name: demon clan fighter
NPC.description: Before you stands an impressive fighter who is sheathed completely in black and red platemail. He wields a glowing blade that seems to be possessed by an evil force.
NPC.longDescription: A fighter dressed in black and red platemail watches you

NPC.name: demon summoner
NPC.description: This mage is dressed in a flowing black and red robe. His eyes glow with the power that is coursing through his body as he attempts to bring demons to this plane of existence.
NPC.longDescription: A summoner stands here chanting to bring a demon to this plane

NPC.name: cambion
NPC.description: Before you stands a cross between a demon and a human. His build is stocky and strong. He has scaly skin and fangs. Small fangs protrude from his head.
NPC.longDescription: A cambion stands off to the side watching carefully

NPC.name: noble cambion
NPC.description: Before you stands a noble cambion. These happen when a human female mates with a demon lord. He looks very human, just the glowing red eyes and dark skin give him away. He opens his mouth and you notice small red fangs instead of teeth.
NPC.longDescription: A cambion dressed richly stares right at you

NPC.name: clan head Irmugar
NPC.description: This is Irmugar the clan leader. He got to this position by killing the former leader and conspiring with many of the demon lords. With their support he took control of the clan and now is attempting to open permanent gates to the abyss so the demons can come and go as they please.
NPC.longDescription: The head of the clan stands here devising a plan to rule the world

NPC.name: demon hezron
NPC.description: Before you stands an ugly demon. His skin is dark green with splashes of red. His eyes glow green in the light. His skin is smooth and shimmers in the light. He stands about six feet tall and four feet across. Down his back he has spikes and his hands end with large claws.
NPC.longDescription: A large demon springs at you

NPC.name: eye of fear and flame
NPC.description: The eye of fear and flame is a hooded man-sized figure. You can't see the face since the interior of the hood is an opaque black screen. You can sense an aura of pure evil emanating from this creature.
NPC.longDescription: A weird hooded human stares at your a large glowing red eye
NPC.shortDescription: An eye of fear and flame

NPC.name: revenant
NPC.description: This humanoid figure presents a pale, corpse-like appearance, with pallid skin drawn tightly over hollow cheekbones; its flesh is unusually cold and clammy. Its eyes - sunken in the face - are dull and heavy lidded.
NPC.longDescription: A revenant wanders the street searching for revenge

NPC.name: eye killer
NPC.description: This creature has a bat-like upper torso on the body of a large snake. Its stunted wings cannot support flight. The upper part of its body is a dark grey-green while the lower part is a medium green flecked with dull yellow. Its eyes are disproportionably large and apparently lidless.
NPC.longDescription: An eye killer rests in the shadows

Item.Name: scale eye
Item.LongDescription: A brown scale glitters somewhat in the lighting

Item.Name: blood eye
Item.LongDescription: A blood shot eye that looks half mad

Item.Name: eye slime
Item.LongDescription: Brown putrid slime

Item.Name: eye justice
Item.LongDescription: The ripped out eye of the enforcer beholder

Item.Name: eye stalk beholder
Item.LongDescription: An eyestalk of a beholder

Item.Name: gnome mace
Item.LongDescription: A dull greyish mace of gnomish design

Item.Name: drow sword darkness
Item.LongDescription: A drow blade seems to cast a shadow of darkness around it

Item.Name: grey helm
